packages.name: AeotecMultiSensor6 Driver
packages.description: A more preference filled alternative to the Built-In driver.
packages.descriptive:
• Temperature Change Amount (Tenths of a degree)? The tenths of degrees the temperature must change to induce an automatic report.
  • Humidity Change Amount (%)? The percentage the humidity must change to induce an automatic report.
  • Luminance Change Amount (LUX)? The amount of LUX the luminance must change to induce an automatic report.
  • Temperature Offset? -128 to +127 (Tenths of a degree) If your temperature is inaccurate this will offset/adjust it by this many tenths of a degree.
  • Humidity Offset/Adjustment -50 to +50 in percent? If your humidity is inaccurate this will offset/adjust it by this percent.
  • Luminance Offset/Adjustment -10 to +10 in LUX? If your luminance is inaccurate this will offset/adjust it by this percent.

packages.name: HoneywellThermo-TCC Driver
packages.description: Integrate Honeywell's Total Comfort Control for your WiFi Thermostat.
packages.descriptive:
• Supports Honeywell's entre level thermostats such as the Honeywell Home Wi-Fi 7-Day Programmable Thermostat (RTH6580WF)
  • This integration makes a Cloud connection to Honeywell's Total Connect Comfort (TCC).
  • This driver, alone, provides control access (setpoints) to the Thermostat. The Thermostat's built-in scheduler can be adequate for most users.
  • Can be combined with Hubitat's Thermostat Controller and/or Hubitat's Thermostat Scheduler.

packages.name: Hubitat-BetterLaundryMonitor
packages.description: Create alerts for your Laundry being done.

packages.name: Auto_Off
packages.description: Automatically turn Off a switch after a delay.

packages.name: Auto_Off Bundle
packages.description: Automatically turn Off a switch after a delay.

packages.name: GetAttributeApp
packages.description: Display a device's Capabilities, Attributes and Commands.
packages.descriptive:
• Select one or more devices and have Capabilities, Attributes and Commands displayed and compare.
  • Very useful as a starting point for custom coding based on existing drivers.

packages.name: Air Quality from AirNow
packages.description: Yet Another Air Quality Index from AirNow

packages.name: Honeywell Thermo Parent
packages.description: A Parent/child version of the original
packages.descriptive:
• Supports multiple Honeywell WiFi Thermostats under a single TCC id with each child thermostat operating independently.
  • Supports Honeywell's entre level thermostats such as the Honeywell Home Wi-Fi 7-Day Programmable Thermostat (RTH6580WF)
  • This integration makes a Cloud connection to Honeywell's Total Connect Comfort (TCC).
  • This driver, alone, provides control access (setpoints) to the Thermostat. The Thermostat's built-in scheduler can be adequate for most users.
  • Can be combined with Hubitat's Thermostat Controller and/or Hubitat's Thermostat Scheduler.

packages.name: EtherRain
packages.description: EtherRain Sprinkler Controller and child Driver

packages.name: AverageThis
packages.description: Calculates a Rolling Average of Illuminance, Temperature and Relative Humidity from a set of Omni Sensors into a virtual sensor of your choice.
packages.descriptive:
• Aggregates sensor data into one virtual sensor that can then be used in automations.
  • Supports two Child types: multisensor or power.

packages.name: Sprinkler Schedule Manager
packages.description: App to schedule sprinkler valves on a daily basis.
packages.descriptive:
• Parent is where Optional Master Day Groups are managed.
  • Parent is where Optional Month by Month watering percentages are managed.
  • Parent is where an outside Temperature device is selected and the temperature limit is set.
  • Multiple child Timetables within the Parent Application.
  • Each Timetable has Days in Groups, ie. weekdays and weekends
  • Each Group of days within a Timetable has a Start Time and a Duration.
  • Groups have conditionals of OverHeat and Rain.
  • Each Timeline has one or more Valves selected.
  • Valves can be assigned to any/all of the Groups.

packages.name: Generic Matter Outlet
packages.description: Test a Matter Tag with HPM
